meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one millionth of a second.
meanings.sent1: In a microsecond, a hummingbird can flap its wings multiple times.
meanings.sent2: I will be back in a microsecond, just need to grab my keys.
meanings.sent3: It only took a microsecond for the cat to realize the laser pointer was a trick.
meanings.sent4: The car sped past in a blur, disappearing in a microsecond.
meanings.sent5: The microsecond it took for the lightning to strike felt like an eternity.
